conclusion: Analyze the image to determine the trajectory of car A and identify collision blocks.

Car A is approaching from the right side towards the center where several blocks are located.
Car A will first collide with the green block near the center as it is moving directly towards it.
After colliding with the green block, the car's direction will change due to deflection and may continue towards the yellow block.
The car will eventually stop near the yellow block based on trajectory and block positions.
